responsibilities: Manage daily social media content calendars and engagement strategies for three major client accounts.
Assist in the development and execution of email marketing campaigns resulting in a 12% increase in open rates.
Coordinate with cross-functional teams to ensure consistent brand messaging across all digital and print platforms.
Monitor and report on monthly campaign performance using CRM and web analytics tools.
Conducted market research and competitor analysis to support the launch of a new SaaS product line.
Drafted copy for weekly newsletters and promotional blog posts targeting B2B audiences.
Maintained the marketing asset library and provided administrative support for seasonal promotional events.
